attributes.action: private renters from discriminating on people on housing and universal credit.
attributes.additional_details: Im a care leaver and I have been support lodgings since 18 half and supported housing since 19 half and I turned 21 this year. Every since I started looked for a place before I turned 18. I have seen so much discrimination against people on benefits. I now understand why people are homeless Becuase most of the affordable places won't accept people like me on benefits
attributes.background: I want you to add a new law stating privatr rents are not allowed to say "we do not accept universal credit or housing benefits"

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306091
